name: Hooked on a Fishing
description:
Defeat the bosses to advance! Can you beat all four on hard mode?

You can't shoot back, so you'll have to hook enemy fish to join with them and force them to fight for you. Once joined you will control their movements, but not their bullets. Watch out!

GAMEPLAY:

Join with enemy fish by using your hook. They won't stop trying to shoot you, but their bullets will now turn white and deal damage to the boss and other enemies. Try and maneuver so that their bullets are useful, but make sure you don't get killed in the process.

CONTROLS:

[WASD] or [Arrow Keys] to move

[Space] or [Z] to shoot the hook (press and hold for power)

[Shift] to move slower

Escape to quit at any time

R to restart at any time
